Package ChessSpecific

Class Cell

java.lang.Object
ChessSpecific.Cell
public class Cell extends Object
Cell - Interactive Robot Chess Cell class is the internal representation of a chess cell. It can hold chess pieces, release and set them. Holds its own position in the chessboard and if the cell is a light cell or not.

3rd party code is used in this class. It is an adaptions from GitHub user: Stevoisiak. Link to the original code: Github Link This class represents the Space.java file

Version:
0.1 ( Initial development )., 0.2 ( Second development )., 1.0 ( Initial release ).
Author:
Omar Ibrahim
